title: 642 - Once, Twice, Thrice a Doctor | Sleepin' With Doctor Who
description:
This house will be safe and full of meanders, you’ll sleep as the Doctor narrows it downs. Have a hush, please don’t shush or shoosh as Scooter’s brain is full of mush. (Who talk at 17:10)   Tonight’s episode is sponsored by Brooklinen, luxury bedding, at amazing prices. You have to try these sheets today!   Goto Brooklinen.com where there is an exclusive offer just for Sleep With Me listeners.

  • Get $20 off AND free shipping when you use promo code [SLEEPWITHME] at Brooklinen.com.

  • Brooklinen is SO confident that they offer a risk-free 60-night satisfaction guarantee and a lifetime warranty on all of their sheets and comforters!
